LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.PaymentFilter
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to filter out payment methods in the checkout process. Offers filters for customer roles, countries, order amount and shipping methods and serves rules such as "Customer has less than n placed orders" and "Customer has spent less than x amount".

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedCustomerRoles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies customer roles for which the payment method should not be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedCountries.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies countries for which the payment method should not be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: CountryContext.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the address to which the selected countries are related to.

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedShippingMethods.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies shipping methods for which the payment method should not be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: MinimumOrderAmount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the minimum order amount from which on the payment method should be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: MaximumOrderAmount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum order amount up to which the payment methods should be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: AmountContext.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the amount to which the minimum and maximum order amounts are related to.

LocaleResource.Name: HasLessThanOrders
LocaleResource.Value: Customer has less than n placed orders

LocaleResource.Name: HasLessThanOrders.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Do not offer this payment method, if the customer has less than n placed orders.

LocaleResource.Name: HasLessThanTotalAmount
LocaleResource.Value: Customer has spent less than x amount

LocaleResource.Name: HasLessThanTotalAmount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Do not offer this payment method, if the customer has spent less than x amount.
